safetyTips: No public contact, gloves and masks worn and coffee roasted to 195 degrees.
name: BLOSS COFFEE COMPANY
address: Kingsmill Granary, Mill Hill, Kingsnorth, TN23 3EW
description: Bloss sells ethically conscious, high quality coffee, with the aim to create change for farmers and coffee drinkers. Small-batch roasters on the outskirts of Ashford. Please order via our website.
